K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273a-1: tri sa ma ya by'u ha r'a dza n'a ma tantra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273a-3: dam tshig gsum bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i rgyud /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273a-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273a-5: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa na rnam par gnas pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-0: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun thams cad la phyag 'tshal @273b lo; ;dbus dang mtha' med yon tan ri bo dpag med dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-1: mchod rten mtha' med mchod pa'i mchog tu 'khrungs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-2: mchod chen 'phags pa'i 'phags pa chen po'i bdag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-3: dus gsum 'khrungs pa'i bde gshegs tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rdo rje chen po'i nye 'khor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-5: rdo rje 'chang chen po nye bar 'du ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa lhag par dgyes pas rnam par rol pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-8: mtha' med pa'i rdo rje chen po'i rtse mo mthon po'i rin po che'i rgyal po rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rgyu las gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-9: rin po che'i rgyal po'i pho brang chen po'i mchog na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs kyi bskor ba'i seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs so; ;de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rdzu 'phrul chen po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis rgya chen por byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po; thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa gsungs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-11: na ma stree ya dhi k'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-13: sarba tr'a pra ti ha ta b'apti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-16: sa ma sa ma sa manta to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-18: sh'a sa ni ha ra ha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-20: bi ga ta r'a ga buddha dharma te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:273b-25: ga ga na mah'a ba ra na laksha ne dzv'a la dzv'a la na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274a-3: byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274a-4: sngags kyi sgor byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di las gang zhig byed par 'gyur ba de ni bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan par mi spyod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274a-5: gzhan du mdor bsdus nas gsungs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274a-6: 'dis skyes bu dam pa de ni sgo mtha' yas pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lhag par dmigs pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo sna tshogs pa'i rjes su zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274a-8: sems can 'dul ba'i sbyor ba rnam pa sna tshogs pas gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtse ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274a-9: las thams cad rjes su dran pa'i cho ga yang dag par sbyor ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274a-12: rjes su mthun pa'i gzugs sna tshogs pa mngon par grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-0: stobs sna tshogs mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i sgo sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i mos pas snying po 'di bzlas @274b na gzugs sna tshogs mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-2: sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa yang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor yang sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-6: mu tig la sogs pa'i char yang mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-7: sems can gyi khams thams cad du yi dvags rnams la bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-9: btung ba yang mngon par rab tu 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-10: dmyal ba rnams kyi grang ba la dro ba yang yang dag par skyed par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-11: dud 'gro rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal yang rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-12: sems can mos pa'i sgo sna tshogs pa'i yul can gyi sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-23: byang chub kyi theg pa la lhag par 'dzeg par byed myur du lhag par 'dzeg pa'i sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-24: pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag kyang ston par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:274b-26: mthar gyis byang chub la gzhol zhing so sor 'god par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-1: sgrub pa la gnas pa skyed par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-3: nyon mongs pa zad par byed /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-9: rang gi smon lam gyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis sems can gyi khams thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-13: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa yang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-14: 'dir yang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis don yongs su mi nyams par bya ba'i chog bshad par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-15: sngags 'dzin pas dang por re zhig byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-16: rigs kyi bu mo byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rnyed pa 'di nyid la bdag nyid dad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-18: sgrub pa po rigs kyi bu 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-19: rigs kyi bu mos snga dro dang po la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-21: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag nyid dbul bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-22: bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba chos kyi dbyings su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275a-23: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la bdag dbul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-0: thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa de @275b rnams kyis kyang bdag la rnam pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-1: dus thams cad du byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-2: yongs su bzung bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-5: de nas sdig pa so sor bshags par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-8: gti mug las skyes pa'i sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis thugs bskyed pa gang gis bshags pa mdzad pa'i sems bskyed pa des bshags par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-11: ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pa ltar des kyang ji tsam du bshags par nus pa de tsam du bshags par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-12: de nas bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-13: gang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-17: sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs sems can gyi khams rnam par sbyong bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-18: sems can gyi khams yongs su srung bar byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-20: 'jig rten las 'das pa de dag thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba bla na med pas rjes su yi rang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:275b-22: byang chub sems dpas mkhyen pa ltar des kyang ji ltar rjes su yi rang bar nus pa de ltar rjes su yi rang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-2: sems can gyi khams na gang nga yir med cing yongs su gzung ba med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga de thams cad sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchod pa'i phrin las kyis dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-6: bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-7: rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchog tu rgya che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa mchog rgya chen po'i gong ma las bla mar mngon par bsgrub pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rab tu 'bab par 'gyur par bsam pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-9: brjod pa mchod pa chen por mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo chen po 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-10: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-11: sarba th'a aungga te spha ra na hi mam ga ga na kham sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-13: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ji ltar mngon par bsngos pa ltar de bzhin du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-14: mchod pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276a-15: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mkhyen to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-0: byang chub sems dpa' 'khor @276b dang bcas pa thams cad la yon tan du bsngags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-1: grags pa sna tshogs kyi glu'i sprin rgya mtsho rab 'byams tshig tu brjod pa 'am bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-2: 'di lta bu'i bstod pa dpe med pa nges par sgrub par byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-3: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-4: sarba tra sa ku su mi ta aa bhi dzny'a r'a shi ni na mo stu te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-5: de nas de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-6: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yon tan bsngags pa brjod pa'i sprin gyi rgya mtsho rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba de lta bur yang dad par bya'o; ;de'i 'og tu sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi sprul pa'i sprin sems can thams cad la dmigs pa las byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-8: bde ba thams cad myur du stsol cig pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-9: yang na sems can thams cad kyi zag pa med pa'i dge ba 'byung ba'i sbyor ba yang dag par 'byung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi grub pa'i mchog de dag gis thob par gyur cig ces de lta bu la sogs pa sems can thams cad la phan pa'i bsam pa yid la byed pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:276b-12: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin mngon par sgrub pa'i rgyu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-1: can gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-2: sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rig pa'i rgyal po chen po 'di lan brgyad brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-3: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-4: na mo stu te mah'a badzra sarba satv'a hi tam ka ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-8: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di brjod pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis de dag gi sprul pa'i sprin rgya che ba mos pas mngon par bsgrubs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-11: sems can gyi khams su sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzad pa yang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyi de dag la yang drag par dad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-14: de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-15: byang chub sems dpa' kho nas mkhyen to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-16: de nas de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i bsod nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-18: rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bya'o; ;de'i 'og tu bdag sdug bsngal bar gyur pa la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277a-20: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis rnam pa thams cad du byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-0: @277b bdag la grub pa'i mchog stsol cig ces brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-4: bzlas pa dang; nan tan du bgyis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi dngos grub la sogs pa grub pa thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-7: dmigs pa dag la goms pa'i sems kyis bla na med pa'i snying po 'di ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid bzlas pa bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-8: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-9: bla na med pa'i seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-10: sems can gyi don bla na med pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po'i sku yongs su sgrub par 'dod pas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas ldang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa rig pa rgya chen po'i tshul gyi mdo sde rnams mngon par mchod cing klog pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-14: tha na phyag byas nas zas bza' bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:277b-15: dang po zas la sngags 'dis lan brgyad mngon par sngags pa byas nas khams kyi dang po lha nyid la dbul zhing de'i 'og tu zas bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-2: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-3: aom ba lim d'a te dzo m'a li ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-4: kha zas kyi sa dub pa spangs nas kyang snga dro'i bya ba gang yin pa de dag thams cad phyi dro'i yang bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-5: nyal na yang yan lag thams cad kyis dang por sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas nas bstod de mal stan la 'dug cing sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-8: bla na med pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog bdag la stsol cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-9: rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba yang gdab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-11: tha ma la mi nyal ba'i sbyor bas dam pa'i chos 'don pa la sogs pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-12: sgrub pa po'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-13: rigs kyi bu mo des de bzhin du nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dang por phyag bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-15: nyin re zhing bdag 'bul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-16: de bzhin du sdig pa so sor bshags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-18: ma byon pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-19: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278a-20: ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-0: sems can thams @278b cad la rang gi bsod nams bstab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-1: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam la phyag byas nas bcang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-4: tha na mchod pa byas nas dad pas snying po 'di bzla bar bya ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-8: brang khang la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-9: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la lhag par dmigs shing bzlas pas sems can thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis stobs bcu mkhyen pa'i sa don du gnyer zhing mngon par 'dod pas 'bum bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-11: byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur zhing de'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-13: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la zhugs pa'i bar du 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-14: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i thabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-15: shes rab la mkhas pa de dag gi bzlas pa'i cho ga yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-16: gal te rig pa 'dzin par gyur cig ces yid la byed na bzlas pa 'bum yongs su rdzogs par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-19: bcu bzhi'i nyin mtshan la gso sbyong byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:278b-20: ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas me tog gi gcal bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor la mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-0: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam @279a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-3: gcal du bkram pa la 'dug pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-4: lo ma la nye bar 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchog slong bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-10: bzlas pas lcags kyi 'khor lo lag pa la thogs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-11: ji srid du 'bar bar ma gyur pa de srid du bzlas pa byas na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing sa chen po 'gul bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-12: rig pa 'dzin pa de dag thams cad 'dus shing de dag gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i rigs su bsod nams ji lta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-14: rang gi skal ba ji lta ba'i gnas rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-15: de nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bsgrub pa'i sa 'thob par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-16: de la lus nyams par yang mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-17: thabs mkhas pa nyid kyis 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod kyang gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-18: 'khor lo'i rim pa ji lta ba de bzhin du rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279a-28: lcags kyu la yang bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-0: thabs mkhas @279b pa dang ldan zhing sems can yongs su bsrung ba'i blo can lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-1: srog la ltos pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-2: thams cad du rjes su 'gro ba'i yid la byed pas lcags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-9: ta la'i lo ma'i rang bzhin las byas pa la sngar smos pa'i cho gas gcig pu dben par 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-10: 'bum bzlas pas bsgrubs na gong ma bzhin rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-14: gi wang la sogs pa lo ma'i bar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-16: lcags kyi snod kha sbyar du bcug la bsgrub par bya ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-20: mu tig gi phreng ba la sogs pa rgyan rnams sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-22: autpal la sogs pa me tog gi khyad par ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-26: mkhar gsil la sogs pa'i yo byad lag par chud pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-29: zhags pa la bsgrubs na 'bar bar 'gyur zhing rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-30: ji snyed kyi grogs 'dod pa de snyed kyi grogs dang lhan cig 'phur zhing 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-31: thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa'i snying po 'di yang bsod nams dang ldan pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:279b-32: bsod nams dang mi ldan pas kyang rung 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-2: tshul khrims dang mi ldan pas yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-4: thabs dang mi ldan pas yang 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-5: mkhas kyang rung; mi mkhas kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-7: gzhan du dad pa med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-8: byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa rnams kyi ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-12: khrus la sogs pa med kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-13: phyi'i gtsang sbra spyod pa la sogs pa med kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-15: sha dag la sogs pa ma spangs kyang rung 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-17: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs pa goms pa'i sems kyis 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-18: gal te bris sku la sgrub pa byed par 'dod na thang ka la bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i ri bo la rin po che'i padma'i steng na bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pus mo btsugs nas padma la bzhugs pa rdo rje dang bcas par thal mo sbyar ba autpa la'i lo ma'i mdog gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-20: pri yang ku ltar sngo sangs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-21: gser gyi mdog can bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs su rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-1: lag pa g-yon gyi lcags kyu yongs su 'dzin pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-3: mtha' med ces bya ba'i 'khor 'bar ba'i snying po can khros shing 'khrugs par 'gyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-4: nor bu'i zur phud kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-5: aa sho ka dmar po'i mdog can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-6: lag pa na gri gug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-7: zhags pa thogs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i 'og tu gzhon nu ma g-yon na zur phud gcig pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-9: nag po sngo bsangs rol par gyur pas 'khor la dga' ba dang bcas pas blta ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-11: lag na me tog gi phreng ba thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-12: mtha' med ma zhes bya ba bran mo bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-13: 'dir yang bris sku la gzhan du yang las de dag nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-14: sgrub pa de dag nyid bya ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-15: rtogs pa thams cad kyi cho ga'i sbyor ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-16: yid la 'dod pa'i cho ga sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-17: dur khrod du 'bum bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'ongs nas lag pa nas bzung ste lcang lo can du 'dren par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-18: des rdo rje rigs kyi gzhon nur gyur pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:280b-19: rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa dngos po ral gri la sogs pa la bsnyen pa byas pa des rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro; ;rgya mtshor zhugs nas 'bum bzlas na klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas su phyin par 'gyur zhing klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-0: phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chu @281a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-1: sems dpa'i lus rab tu thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-6: rin po che la sogs pa de rnams kyi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang por 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-8: klu'i rigs thams cad blo mthun par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-9: char chen po rnam pa sna tshogs pa mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-10: klu'i mtshe'u gang du 'bum bzlas na klu'i gnas der rab tu 'jug par 'gyur zhing der gang 'dod pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro; ;gang g'ar zhugs shing 'bum bzlas la 'bum yongs su rdzogs nas de nyid du mchod rten brtsigs la sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-12: yungs kar dang bcas pas sbyin sreg byas na klu thams cad skrag pas lhags par 'gyur zhing gang smras pa de byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-13: dur khrod du yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg byas na gnod sbyin gong ma bzhin byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-15: tsandan gyi sbyin sreg gis sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-16: nags kyi gnas su rig pa 'dzin pa la sbrang rtsi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-17: pi pi ling gi sbyin sreg byas na thams cad 'dus par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281a-18: dus thams cad du rjes su dran pa tsam gyis rang gi bka' lung sgrub par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-0: shing gi grib mas shing gzhan la ma phog pa ni shing gcig @281b go; shing gcig gi drung du rjes su dran pas mchod rten byas shing 'bum bzlas la mdun du aa shvadtha las byas pa'i rtse gsum pa byas la nyin mtshan smyung bar 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-1: nya la bris bskus shing ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-2: ji srid du 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du mtshan rangs pa bsgrub pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-3: gdul dka' ba 'dul bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de gling bzhi ba'i phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-4: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la bzlas pa 'bum byas la nya la 'khor lo'i phyag mtshan nam; rdo rje'i phyag mtshan nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-5: rgyal mtshan blangs nas ji srid 'phur ba de srid bzlas na des kun tu 'gro ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-6: chu bor zhugs te bzlas pa 'bum byas nas sa la byas pa'i mchod rten gyi rtsar nya la sogs pa'i nyin zhag la ji skad bshad pa'i gnas su cho ga snga ma bzhin lag pas nor bu blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-7: ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid bzlas na yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'chang ba'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-8: yang de nyid lag pas blangs te bzlas pas yid bzhin gyi nor bur 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-9: zangs ma'i bum pa la chog 'di nyid kyis bsgrub pa byas na bum pa gang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:281b-10: slong mos 'tsho zhing lcags kyi rdo rje lag par blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-1: gyi smra bar bya ba ston par byed pa de srid bzlas pas chos gang nyan par 'dod pa de mngon par ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-2: de'i steng du bsgrubs na 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-3: 'bar bar gyur pas lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-4: rdo rje ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-7: glegs bam lag par blangs te bsgrubs pas rdo rje'i rigs su 'jug par 'gyur zhing thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-9: gzhon nu ma legs par khrus byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-10: rgyan gyis brgyan pa la sngon du bsnyen pa byas la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-11: nyin mtshan smyung bar mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-14: gzhan dag gi mdun du ku sha'i gcal bkram pa la 'dug nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thal mo sbyar ba byas nas gsol ba btab la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-20: du ru skas du ba med pa'i me mdag la sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-21: de dag med na skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-22: lag pas de dag bzung la ji srid gzhon nu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282a-23: gzhon nu ma 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas pas rab tu 'bar zhing 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-0: lag pas blangs pa de @282b dag dang bcas par rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-1: bud med legs par khrus byas shing rgyan gyis brgyan pa la ji srid skyes par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-4: sa las byas pa'i seng+ge la ji srid 'gro bar gyur pa de srid bzlas pas de la zhon zhing gang du 'dod pa der 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-5: gal te nyin re rtag tu bzlas na gang du 'gro ba'i sa phyogs de bsrung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-6: gal te nyin mtshan du bsgrub pa byed na ni ji srid zhag lnga'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-9: lhag ma'i zla ba phyed kyi nang du yar 'phags par 'gyur zhing lha rnams las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-10: de la zhon na gang du 'dod pa der 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-18: ri dags la bzlas na de dag thams cad nyid gang du ji srid 'dod pa de srid tu 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-20: me tog gis rab tu gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor la dur khrod kyi shing la me sbar la mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-21: yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg byas na zla ba phyed kyi nang du nges par mkha' la 'phur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-22: dur khrod du ji lta ba bzhin du ri la sogs pa la yang gcig tu dben par 'dug ste bsgrub pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:282b-23: ngang pa la sogs pa bya la bsgrub pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283a-2: mchil lham la sogs pa la yang yid la 'dod pas cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283a-3: shing mya ngan med kyi yang ka la 'jus nas ji srid nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283a-4: mi snang bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283a-5: de bzhin du shing aa shvadtha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283a-10: dur khrod kyi shing la 'dzegs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283a-11: ji srid mi snang bar 'gro ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283a-12: de ltar mi snang bar gyur bas lo stong 'tsho bar yang 'gyur zhing khru gang tsam gyis sa la ma reg par 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283a-13: bsod snyoms kyi 'tsho bas dur khrod du ji srid du mi snang bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283a-14: dur khrod du zhag lnga 'dug ste bzlas pa byas nas phyis de nyid du sa'i rang bzhin gyi mchod rten byas nas der me tog gi dkyil 'khor byas te thal ba lag pa'i kha sbyar du bcug ste ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas pa byas nas des mdzub ris gsum byas pas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283a-15: sha ma ta la'i rtsa bskam po phye mar byas te dur khrod du me tog gis mngon par gtor ba'i dkyil 'khor byas la lag pa kha sbyor ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-0: kham phor kha sbyar du bcug ste ji srid du ba @283b 'thul ba de srid du bzlas la des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-1: de bzhin du 'gro na pushpa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-3: aindra ba ru ni rnams kyi rtsa ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-16: gzhan dag phye mar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-18: lag pa kha sbyar du bcug ste ji srid du ba 'thul ba de srid du bzlas pa des mig la bskus na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-19: dur khrod du sbrang rtsi la lan stong mngon par sngags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-20: mig la bskus na ma mthong ba thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-21: dgon par mchod rten gyi logs la shing rta bris la ji srid zla ba phyed kyi nang du 'gul bar gyur pa de srid nyin mtshan bzlas la de la zhon na kun tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-22: ba bla blangs te dben ba'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-24: ri la sogs pa la ji srid dngos grub gsum grub par 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-25: de bzhin du gi wang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-26: lig bu mig la sogs pa la bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-27: dge slong gis rtag tu chos gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:283b-29: 'khar gsil la sogs pa blangs la bzlas pa bya zhing 'jog pa na bsrung ba byas te gzhag par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284a-1: lta bu la sogs pa'i las su bya ba byed pa na yid la 'dod pa'i cho gas bsgrub pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i cho gas bsgrubs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po 'di 'dod pa phun sum tshogs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284a-3: thogs pa med par don yod pa'i yid la 'dod pa'i cho ga ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284a-4: byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'di ltar bdag por khas blangs nas phyag 'tshal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284a-7: byang chub sems dpar bcas pa rjes su dran zhing bzlas pa goms par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284a-8: gal te skyil krung ma bshig par mtshan mo gcig pur ri la sogs pa dri zhim pa dben ba na dben bar 'dug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284a-9: bzlas pa byed na nyi ma shar ba'i dus kyi tshe bsnyen pa ma byas par yang rig pa 'dzin par nges par mtshan gcig gis 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284a-10: tsog pur 'dug nas byas na gdon mi za bar zla ba phyed kyi nang du lus yongs su 'gyur bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284a-11: dkyil 'khor me tog la sogs pas mngon par gtor bar byas la mchod rten la mngon du phyogs pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284a-12: lugs sku la mngon par phyogs pas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-0: byang chub sems @284b dpa' thams cad la bdag dbul zhing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-1: 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i las kyi sgrib pa rnams spong bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-2: chu bo'i dogs su mchod rten byas la chu bo de nyid du sked pa nub tsam du zhugs te bzlas na las kyi sgrib pa zad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-3: de bzhin du mchod rten la skor ba byed cing stong phrag brgyad bzlas na sdig pa las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-4: dben bar mig btsums te sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs nas ji srid mig btsums pa de kho nas de bzhin gshegs pa yid kyis mthong bar 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-6: sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-7: mi smra bar stong phrag brgyad bzlas pa byas na dkyil 'khor thams cad du rab tu zhugs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-8: 'dis dam tshig thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-9: rnam par 'tshe ba la mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-10: yungs kar gyi sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-11: nad pa rnams kyi don du ni mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-13: khros pa rnams kyi don du sbrang rtsi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-14: rgyal po 'dren par byed pa la ni yungs kar til mar la sbags pas sbyin sreg bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-15: g-yul 'gyed pa la ni 'od ma'i tsher ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:284b-16: 'chi ba la ma da na'i tsher ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-1: gam; du du ra ga'i me tog yungs kar gyi mar la sbags nas sbyin sreg byas na 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-2: mu tsu kundha'i phur bu ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du sbas na mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-3: sngags phur bus btab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-4: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-5: lcags kyi phur bus btab na rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-7: gnod pa byed pa phur bus btab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-8: aa sho ka'i phur bus lam po che'i bzhi mdor brkos na gdon chen po rengs par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-9: nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa'i rims thams cad la skud pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-10: bdug spos dri zhim po rnams kyis mgo btums la rang la bdugs na sel bar byed cing lhas bstan nas smra bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-11: de bzhin du sbyin sreg gang yin pa des kyang klu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-12: gnod sbyin la sogs pa med par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-13: zla ba gzas zin pa na zangs ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-16: dngul gyi snod du bcug pa'i mar la ji srid dngos grub gsum thob par 'gyur ba de srid du bzlas la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285a-18: nyi ma gzas zin pa na ba bla shing mya ngan med kyi lo ma la bzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-0: ri @285b bo'i mchod rten gyi rtsar dkyil 'khor la me tog gtor ba byas shing ji srid grub pa gsum thob par gyur pa de srid du bzlas na 'bar bar gyur nas rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-1: ba bla la ji lta ba de bzhin du lig bu mig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-2: ldong ros la sogs pa la zla ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-3: nyi ma gzas zin pa na bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul la 'jug par 'gyur ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-9: skye bo sdug bsngal ba rnams 'khor ba las yongs su srung bar byed 'dod pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-10: bdag nyid mthong ba'i chos nyid la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la nges par sbyor bar 'dod pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-11: gsal por snang ba la gzhan dag yang dag par sbyor bar 'dod pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las legs so zhes bya ba'i rnam pa rab tu bsgrags pa myur du rnyed par 'dod pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-13: phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la skye brnyed par 'dod pas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-14: sngags kyi spyod pa'i sgo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bslab par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-15: thabs la mkhas pa 'dis kyang yongs su zin par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-16: smon lam rgya chen po bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-17: sdig pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-18: dus gsum du 'byung ba'i bsod nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:285b-19: ye shes kyi tshogs 'jig rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-0: 'jig rten las 'das pa la rjes su @286a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-2: rjes su yi rang ba yang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyu nyid du rab tu sbyor bar gyur cig ces de ltar bsngo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-4: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-5: sems can gyi don 'byung bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-6: ces dang po'i tshig tu brjod pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-8: dmigs nas bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-9: smon lam gyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab cing sems can gyi don 'di 'byung bar gyur cig ces dang po tshig tu brjod pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-11: rnam par bsams te bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-12: dben ba'i sa phyogs su 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa shin tu rgya chen po'i mdo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu la rab tu 'jug pa klog pa nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-16: mchod pa nyid tshes gcig nas brtsams te zla ba gcig gi bar du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-17: de nas nya la mchod pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-18: mtshan thog thag tu bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon zhing mgo la phyag gis byugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286a-23: legs so zhes gsung bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-0: de la sogs @286b pa mi brjed pa'i gzungs rnyed par 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rjes su zhugs nas mngon par shes pa lnga thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-2: ji ltar sems can rnams 'tshang rgya ba'i rgyur gyur cig ces rnam par bsams la bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-3: de bzhin du sems can rnams kyi nad rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-4: sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur cig ces de ltar bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-5: grang ba'i dmyal ba rnams la dro ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-6: tsha ba'i dmyal ba rnams la grang ba nyid 'byung bar gyur cig ces bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-7: dud 'gro gcig la gcig za ba rnams med par gyur cig ces bzlas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-8: sems can gyi khams thams cad du sdug bsngal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-9: yid mi bde ba thams cad med par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-11: yid bde ba thams cad 'byung bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-12: yi dvags rnams la bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-13: btung ba 'byung bar gyur cig ces de ltar zang zing med pa'i sems can thams cad la longs spyod pa 'byung bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-14: sems can thams cad kyi dge ba rab tu 'phel ba'i shugs 'byung bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:286b-16: yid bde ba de dag rnams la 'byung bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-0: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa @287a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-1: dang; rjes su yi rang ba la sogs pa'i dge ba'i shugs 'byung bar gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-3: ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-4: stobs bcu mkhyen pa'i sa la sems can so sor gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-6: sems can la phan pa'i rgyur dmigs te sngags bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-8: 'khor bar gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-9: sdug bsngal ba la sogs pa rab tu spang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces sngags bzla bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-11: de bzhin du bzlas pas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-12: smon lam gyi stobs dang; bsod nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-13: ye shes kyi stobs kyis go rims ji lta ba bzhin du sems can gyi khams su sems can gyi don gyi khyad par chung ngu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-16: de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-17: mos pa rgya che ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-18: dad pas byang chub mngon par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu de la yang dad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-19: de la 'di'i dpe bstan pa ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287a-21: yang 'dod pa'i khams na dbang phyug ces bya ba yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-0: 'dod pa skyed par byed pa zhes bya ba'i @287b rig pas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'dod pas rgyal bar byed cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-1: 'dod pa'i longs spyod yongs su longs spyod pa yang yang dag par ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-2: me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-4: nor bu yod pa'i sa phyogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-6: longs spyod nye bar stobs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-8: yang lha'i bu dbang phyug ces bya ba yod de des yid ltar mgyogs pa zhes bya ba'i rig pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi las su bya ba byed cing yo byad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-9: longs spyod mngon par sprul nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la yang nye bar ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-11: yang rig pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis gos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-12: bza' ba dang; btung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-18: phreng ba la sogs pa mngon par sprul nas yongs su longs spyod par byed cing gzhan dag la ster bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-20: yang mig 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mig 'phrul mkhan zhes bya bas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mig 'phrul ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:287b-22: yang lha ma yin rnams sngags kyi sgyu ma byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-0: yang sman bas sngags kyis sems can mang po rnams kyi @288a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-4: nad rnams sel bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-6: yang sngags kyis me'i dro ba med par byed cing grang ba yang dro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-8: yang mngon par gnod par byed pas rims kyis 'dzin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-10: yang ma mo'i rtog pas sems can mang po rnams la gsod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-13: sdig pa rnams la sdig pa'i sngags kyis sdig pa la sbyor bar yang byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-15: yang gnod sbyin gyi sems rnam par g-yo bar byed pa'i sngags kyis sems dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-16: yid bde ba la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-17: gzhan dag kyang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-18: de lta bu la sogs pa'i nges pa ston pa ni sngags kyi stobs yin par blta bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-19: gsang sngags de'i stobs ni gsang sngags nyid las 'byung ba yang ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-20: sems can las 'jug pa yang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-21: sbyor ba byas pa yang mi dmigs mod kyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-22: sngon gyi bsnyen pa'i cho ga las gsang sngags kyi stobs rab tu shes par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-23: byin gyis brlabs kyi chos nyid las byung ba las 'das pa yang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288a-24: chos thams cad kyi chos nyid 'di yang 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-1: 'gro bar byed pa yang ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-2: byed pa po yang ma yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-4: bden par gyur pa mi slu ba yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-5: de bas na dad pas sngags 'dis sems can thams cad kyi don bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-6: tshe 'di nyid la mthong ba'i chos kyi yon tan 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-9: ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed 'dod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-10: yon tan rin po che so sor thob par 'dod pas bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-11: sems can gyi don gyi phyir mngon par brjod pa'i sbyor ba 'dis bsgrubs na myur ba kho nar ji ltar 'dod pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-13: sems can rnams la phan pa'i rgyur gyur ba ji skad du bshad pa'i dngos grub kyi go 'phang gang yin pa rnam par bsams la bzlas pa 'bum byas na nges par de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal mthong zhing mgo la byugs te ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyang myur du stsol bar mdzad par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-14: yid kyis las su bya ba ci 'dod pa la sbyor ba'ang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-15: rtog pa'i cho ga gzhan nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-16: sngags 'di la rtogs pa thams cad kyi cho gas sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:288b-17: dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po las gsungs pa'i cho ga las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289a-2: yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289a-3: snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku'i yan lag thams cad las de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba'i rig pa'i rgyal po byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289a-4: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satva n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289a-5: aom aa ma la bi kr'anta te dz'i ni aa ra dze sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289a-7: 'di ni chos kyi spyod yul mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289a-8: dbus med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rig pa mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289a-9: thogs pa med pa don yod par grub pa'i rig sngags chen po rtog pa'i sbyor ba rab 'byams yangs pa mtha' med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289a-10: sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dis las rnams gang bag med pa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par smyo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289a-11: mdor bstan na bzlas pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289a-12: gsang sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su thob nas rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i sku sems can gyi khams thams cad la yang @289b dag par ston par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-1: mos pa sna tshogs pa rnams la 'tsham par 'khor ba las zlog pa'i phyir sgyu ma mkhan bzhin du thams cad du song ba thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i gsang sngags chen po 'dis sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-3: ye shes kyi tshogs las byung ba mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-4: dpus med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-5: dge bas rgyas par byas pa'i sems kyi 'jug pas byin gyis brlabs pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung gi 'khor lo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-6: gzhan dag kyang sems can gyi khams rnams las 'byung zhing thos par 'gyur cig ces sems can thams cad bskyab par dmigs nas sngags bzlas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyi shugs la dad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-7: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa bas tha na gzung ba tsam la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-8: rtog pa 'dir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis don yod pa thogs pa med pa smon lam gyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-9: byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:289b-10: de las 'dir rig pa 'dzin pa thob pa'i thabs phyogs tsam brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-0: 'dir dad pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas @290a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la snga ma bzhin du bdag gi lus dbul bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-3: de nas dus thams cad pa'i sdig pa bshags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-6: yid kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-7: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa las byung ba rnams nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshags par bya'o; ;de nas 'das pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-9: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-10: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-11: ye shes kyi tshogs thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-12: sems can thams cad skyob cing phan par mdzad pa la rjes su yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-13: dpag tu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi don mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa nyid la yang rjes su yi rang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-15: de nas 'di ltar yang bsam par bya'o; ;de bzhin gshegs pa gcig cig gi bsod nams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-16: ye shes kyi tshogs kyang tshad med do zhes rjes su yi rang nas sems can thams cad kyi phyir yongs su bsngo na mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-17: dbus med pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa rgya chen po 'byung bar 'gyur na gang yang sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290a-18: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-1: tshad med pa khong du chud par byas nas rjes su yi rang ba lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-2: yang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa gang yin pa des rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-3: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang dag par byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-4: bdag gi med pa rjes su ma bzung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-5: thang las skyes pa rin po che'i ri la sogs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-7: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mchod pa'i don du bsngo bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-8: de nas bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i dam pa rgya chen po'i mchod pa'i sprin sna tshogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-9: bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces nges par bsams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-10: 'di skad lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-11: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-12: sarba th'a aut ga te spha ra na h'i m'am ga ga na kham sa manta ta sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-13: de'i rjes la gzhan ma yin par de bzhin du mchod pa rnams de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:290b-14: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yon tan bsngags pa mtha' yas pa rab 'byams @291a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291a-1: rgya mtsho rnams bdag gi smon lam gyi stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'byung bar gyur cig ces bsams la sngags 'di lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291a-4: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291a-5: sarba tr'am sam ku su mi t'a aa bhi dzny'a na r'a shi ni na mo stu te sv'ah'a; de nas bstod pa yang dag par brjod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ji ltar mkhyen pa bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291a-6: de nas sangs rgyas dang; byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis thams cad du sdug bsngal bar gyur pa bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291a-8: mchog stsal du gsol zhes tshig tu brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291a-9: de nas sems can thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs zag pa med pa rnal 'byor las yang dag par byung ba rab tu thob par gyur cig ces kyang brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291a-11: dbus med pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291a-12: bde ba sbyin par yid la byas nas de lta bu'i sprul pa'i sprin mngon par sgrub par byed pa'i sbyor bas bstan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i sngags lan brgyad kyi bar du brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-1: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal zhing dmigs la bzlas pa goms par byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub grub par gyur pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad grub par gyur pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba la dmigs pa'i sems kyis goms par byas shing bzlas par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-5: ji srid skyo bar ma gyur gyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-6: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas bla na med pa'i seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs pa dang; bla na med pa'i sems can gyi don mdzad cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po ye shes kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa la mngon par mos pas sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas langs te 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa la sogs pa yangs shing rgya che ba'i mdo sde bklag pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-9: gzhan yang rung ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du snga dro dus kyi bar du gnas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-10: de nas glegs bam la sogs pa mchod pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-11: tha na mchod rten la phyag 'tshal byas nas zas bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-12: za ba'i tshe kha zas la sngags 'dis lan brgyad mngon par sngags la dang po'i chang bu lha bshos su phul la bza' bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:291b-13: de la sngags ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-1: ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-3: te dzo m'a li ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-4: zas kyis dub pa cung zhing ngal bsos la phyi dro'i dus su yang cho ga 'di bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-5: nyal ba'i tshe dang por sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal nas bdag nyid phul la phyi nas mal du ji ltar 'dod par gnyid log la nam gyi cha stod dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-7: cha smad la mi nyal bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-8: de la cho ga ni 'di yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-9: tshes gcig nas brtsams nas nyin re zhing zla ba gcig rdzogs kyi bar du 'di bzhin du bya ba yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-10: gal te cho ga 'ga' zhig ma byas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-11: bya ba gzhan gyis brel bas nyi ma gcig gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-13: gsum la sogs par las las nyams na yang des brtson 'grus dor bar mi bya ste zla ba de nyid kyi nya la nyin mtshan gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-16: dam pa'i chos glegs bam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-17: gzhan gyi mdun du yang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-18: mchod pa ci 'byor pa byas nas ku sha bkram pa la 'dug ste bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas 'khor lo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-19: rdo rje dang; rtse gsum dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292a-23: sa las byas pa yang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i le'u nas gsungs @292b pa'i mtshon cha rnams las gang 'dod pa zhig lag tu blangs nas bsgrub pa byas na des nam phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292b-1: nyi ma 'char kar nges par 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292b-2: de nyid rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292b-3: skad cig de la rig 'dzin gyi rigs kun nye bar 'dus nas de la dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292b-4: de nas bzung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du nam mkha' la rgyu zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rjes su 'jug cing mchod pa byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la zhugs nas bde ba dang ldan bzhin du lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292b-6: gnod sbyin thams cad kyis mchod cing rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad mngon par dga' bar byed pa'i rig sngags 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292b-7: mtha' yas pa'i bud med kyi 'khor la sogs pa la yongs su longs spyod kyang nyams par mi 'gyur zhing lus de nyid mi 'dor bar bde bar rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292b-8: thabs 'di nyid kyis mthar gyis sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi sku'i bar du yang thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:292b-10: 'khor lo la sogs pa mtshon cha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du ldong ros dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-9: ta la'i lo ma las ral gri dang; chu gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-11: kha tv'am ga la sogs pa'i rdzas su byas pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-12: lhag mas kyang bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-15: gsang sngags dang; rtog pa'i cho ga gzhan la yang sbyar ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i rdzas rnams sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po nas gsungs pa'i cho ga 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-18: yid la gang 'dod pa'i cho gas kyang sgrub pa byas na de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-20: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thad nas dngos grub blang ba'i cho ga'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-21: ji skad bstan pa'i phyogs gcig du mchod rten dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-23: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam mam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-24: gang yang rung ba'i mdun du me tog sil ma bkram pa'i dkyil 'khor byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-27: phreng ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-28: ma byas kyang rung; ku sha'i chang bu la nye bar 'dug nas lag pa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293a-30: ldong ros la sogs pa'i rdzas bzung nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-2: gser gyi snod du bzhag la ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-3: de bzhin du bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-4: gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-5: 'di ni thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i cho ga yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-6: cho ga 'di nyid kyis dben zhing stong pa'i ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-12: sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi rtsa 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-15: gtsug lag khang gi brang khang la sogs pa dben par bsgrub par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-17: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la goms par byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-18: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-21: ser sna med pas som nyi dang bral ba'i sems kyis lus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-22: srog la yang ltos pa med par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-24: thams cad kyi thun mong gi cho ga ni ri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-26: 'bab chu'i ngos la sogs pa'i gnas dben zhing stong pa rnams su dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-27: gnyis su gnas la dus gsum du sdig pa bshags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:293b-29: ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ba byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-1: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan sngar gsol ba 'debs pas ci srid mtshan ma byung bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-2: yar ngo'i nya la cho ga snga ma bzhin du nyin zhag gcig smyung bar gnas nas ji skad bstan pa'i rdzas rnams las gang yang rung ba blangs la ji srid 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas na de nyid kyis rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-3: rig pa mchod don yod pa 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-5: yid la re ba'i phun sum tshogs pa sgrub par byed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-6: ji lta ji ltar rab tu sbyor ba de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-7: rang bzhin gyis grub pa bklags pas 'grub pa yin pas bzlas pa tsam gyis 'dod pa thams cad byed pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-8: don yod pa'i rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin du sbyar ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-9: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-10: yang na ras ris bsgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-11: bcom ldan 'das padma'i gdan la skyil mo krung gis bzhugs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas logs su 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje kun nas 'bar bas bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294a-13: bcom ldan 'das cod ban las byung ba'i 'od zer gyis mngon par dbang bskur ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yon logs su rig pa'i @294b mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal mo gser gyi mdog can ral pa dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-3: bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-5: bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'og tu mtha' med ces bya ba'i 'khor ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-6: zhags pa lag na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-7: mdog sngo bsangs khros shing 'khrugs pa gos dmar ser zung bgos pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-9: bgegs thams cad tshar gcod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-10: mngag gzhug pa rin po che'i brag la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-11: 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje'i 'og tu ni sgrub pa po thal mo sbyar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-12: rin po che'i brag gi padma'i sdong po la bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-13: me tog gi 'khri shing gis kun nas bskor ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-14: de lta bu'i ras ris kyi mdun du cho ga 'dis ji ltar 'dod par ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-15: rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga dang yang sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-16: rig pa mchog gi ras ris gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa padma dmar po la rab tu bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-17: de'i 'og tu mngag gzhug pa mtha' med lag pa na ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:294b-18: zhags pa thogs pa de dang 'dra bar bri bar bya'o; ;ras ris 'dir yang las de dag kun bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-0: cho ga gzhan yang ri la sogs pa stong zhing dben pa'i phyogs gcig tu skyil mo krung bcas nas byang chub sems dpa' @295a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-1: dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dmigs nas mtshan thog thag skyil mo krung ma bshig par bzlas pa byas na sngon du bsten ba ma byas kyang tho rangs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-2: nam phyed na rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-3: mthu mtshungs pa med pa dang ldan pas phyir mi ldog pa'i rig pa 'dzin pas mchod par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-4: sems can thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-5: rig pa'i mchog 'di gang gi lag tu thob pa de ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-6: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yang dag par bsrungs bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-7: sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-8: klu la sogs pa dgug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-10: yid la gang 'dod pa rtog pa gzhan gyi cho ga bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i tshig gang yin pa'i dam pa nyis 'gyur du sbyar bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-12: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba rig pa'i mchog rdzogs so ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295a-13: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs @295b kyis rdo rje shugs kyi yi ge zhes bya ba byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295b-1: de las ni rig pa'i mchog gi rdo rje'i tshig 'di byung bar gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295b-2: na ma: sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295b-3: aom bi ra dzi bi ra dzi mah'a bi ra dzi satva satva /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295b-4: s'a ra te s'a ra te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295b-5: tr'a yi tr'a yi bi dha ma h'a t'i sam bhanydza ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295b-6: tarma ti siddha aa gre tram sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-005:295b-7: 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i mchog 'di la yang rig pa'i mchog dang po mi mnyam pa dang /
